attributes.action: Ban Greyhound Racing Until A Satisfactory Wefare System Is Put In Place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year hundreds, if not thousands, of greyhounds are destroyed because they have come to the end of their racing lives.

There is no adequate provision for the homing of sufficient numbers of these wonderful dogs, yet bookmakers and stadia make substantial profits from their exploitation.

Until the industry can agree a timescale for the introduction of a comprehensive welfare scheme, for retired and injured dogs, the sport should be banned.
